title: This Week in Tech: Lots of Special Edition Bikes, an Ultralight Hub, and Lael Wilcox Bringing Joy to YouTube
content:
Look and Pinarello have special editions with unbelievable paint, No.22 drops a new spin on Ti gravel, and Formula Fixed tries to make racing bite-sized, plus more in this week in tech

Read the full article at This Week in Tech: Lots of Special Edition Bikes, an Ultralight Hub, and Lael Wilcox Bringing Joy to YouTube on Velo.
author: Josh Ross
